{{dablink|For the municipality in Germany see [[Asse (Samtgemeinde)]].}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Asse |picture=Assemartinuskerk.jpg |picture-width=260px |picture-legend=Sint-Martinuskerk |map=AsseLocatie.png |map-legend=Asse in the Province of [[Flemish Brabant]] |arms=Asse.jpg |flag=Flag of Asse.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-VB}} |arrondissement=[[Halle-Vilvoorde administrative Arrondissement|Halle-Vilvoorde]] |nis=23002 |pyramid-date=01/01/2006 |0-19=23.09 |20-64=59.22 |65=17.68 |foreigners=4.80 |foreigners-date=01/07/2005 |mayor=Koen Van Elsen ([[Christian Democratic & Flemish|CD&V]]) |majority=[[Christian Democratic and Flemish|CD&V]], [[Flemish Liberals and Democrats|VLD]], [[Socialist Party – Different|SP.A]] |postal-codes=1730, 1731 |telephone-area=052 - 02 |web=[http://www.asse.be/ www.asse.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=54 |lon_deg=04 |lon_min=12 }}
'''Asse''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Flemish Brabant]]. The municipality comprises the towns of Asse proper, [[Bekkerzeel]], [[Kobbegem]], [[Mollem]], [[Relegem]] and [[Zellik]]. On [[January 1]] [[2006]] Asse had a total population of 29,191. The total area is 49.64 [[square kilometre|km²]] which gives a [[population density]] of 588 inhabitants per km².
The Hopduvel (Hopdevil) represents the storm that hit Asse-Ternat at the end of the month of August, 1970. The [[Hop (plant)|hop vine]] crop, which was almost ready for harvest, was severely damaged when the hop vines were knocked to the ground. The ' hopduvel ' was invented by the hop farmers and was formalized by the founder of the “Hopduvelfeesten” (Hop Devil Festival), Eugeen Van den Broeck. Every year the Hopduvelfeesten is organised after the hop harvest in order to have a good harvest in the following years. This is symbolically done by burning the hopduvels that have been assembled by the local farmers and for which a contest is organised to elect the best (ugliest) Hopduvel.
